languages.text: "Все это не приведет ни к чему хорошему... нам хватает бед и без появления этой анафемы под нашим боком".
"None of this is going to lead to anything good... We have enough troubles without this anathema appearing under our noses."
languages.original_text: "Все это не приведет ни к чему хорошему... нам хватает бед и без появления этой анафемы под нашим боком".

traits.locale_text: "None of this is going to lead to anything good... We have enough troubles without this anathema appearing under our noses."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "None of this is going to lead to anything good... We have enough troubles without this anathema appearing under our noses."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “这一切恐怕不会有什么好结果……就算这个诅咒之物没有出现在我们眼皮底下，我们也还有一大堆麻烦要处理。”
languages.original_text: "None of this is going to lead to anything good... We have enough troubles without this anathema appearing under our noses."

traits.locale_text: “这一切恐怕不会有什么好结果……就算这个诅咒之物没有出现在我们眼皮底下，我们也还有一大堆麻烦要处理。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Ça n'augure rien de bon. Comme si nous n'avions pas déjà assez d'ennuis comme ça... »
languages.original_text: "None of this is going to lead to anything good... We have enough troubles without this anathema appearing under our noses."

traits.locale_text: « Ça n'augure rien de bon. Comme si nous n'avions pas déjà assez d'ennuis comme ça... »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Esto no va a llevar a nada bueno... Teníamos suficientes problemas antes de que este anatema apareciera delante de nuestras narices».
languages.original_text: "None of this is going to lead to anything good... We have enough troubles without this anathema appearing under our noses."

traits.locale_text: «Esto no va a llevar a nada bueno... Teníamos suficientes problemas antes de que este anatema apareciera delante de nuestras narices».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「好転するような材料がまるでありませんな…この呪いがなくとも、十分な苦難が鼻先まで迫っています」
languages.original_text: "None of this is going to lead to anything good... We have enough troubles without this anathema appearing under our noses."

traits.locale_text: 「好転するような材料がまるでありませんな…この呪いがなくとも、十分な苦難が鼻先まで迫っています」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Das kann alles kein gutes Ende nehmen ... Wir haben schon genug Sorgen, ohne dass dieses Anathema direkt vor unserer Nase erscheint."
languages.original_text: "None of this is going to lead to anything good... We have enough troubles without this anathema appearing under our noses."

traits.locale_text: "Das kann alles kein gutes Ende nehmen ... Wir haben schon genug Sorgen, ohne dass dieses Anathema direkt vor unserer Nase erscheint."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "None of this is going to lead to anything good... We have enough troubles without this anathema appearing under our noses."

languages.text: "Bu işin sonu hepimiz için kötü olacak... Yeterince derdimiz yokmuş gibi bir de dibimizde bu musibet peyda oldu."
languages.original_text: "None of this is going to lead to anything good... We have enough troubles without this anathema appearing under our noses."

traits.locale_text: "Bu işin sonu hepimiz için kötü olacak... Yeterince derdimiz yokmuş gibi bir de dibimizde bu musibet peyda oldu."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
